mean_cn: n.时髦，风尚；  vt.制作，塑造
mean_en: a popular style of clothes, hair, etc. at a particular time or place; the state of being popular; a popular way of behaving, doing an activity, etc.; the business of making or selling clothes in new and different styles
sentence: He is trying to keep up with the latest fashion trend.
sentence_trans: 他在努力追随最新的时尚潮流。
